newsitem.title: CANADA: NHL-LEMIEUX REIGNS AS TOP MONEY EARNER.
newsitem.headline: NHL-LEMIEUX REIGNS AS TOP MONEY EARNER.

text.p: Pittsburgh Penguins forward Mario Lemieux, "Super Mario" to his legion of fans, reigns supreme atop the National Hockey League's payroll list.
Lemieux, benefitting from a special lump sum payment, will earn a whopping $11,321,429 this season, according to salary figures provided by the NHL Players' Association.
New York Rangers teammates Mark Messier and Wayne Gretzky follow at $6 million and $5,047,500, respectively.
Pavel Bure, the Vancouver Canucks' Russian Rocket, will make $5 million.
Philadelphia's Eric Lindros is 10th on the list at $4,182,000.
Some 72 NHL players will make $2 million or more this year.
